Reduce stress in your life, as it can intensify chronic pain. Negative feelings like anxiety, stress and anger can increase the body's sensitivity to pain. Living with osteoarthritis. The key to living well with osteoarthritis of the knee is YOU. Studies show that people with osteoarthritis who take part in their own care report less pain and make fewer medical visits. Taking control of your osteoarthritis management can help you reduce your pain while remaining active. It can also help build your confidence in your ability to live an active, independent life.
